front.title: Remote Authentication Dial-In User Service (RADIUS) Authorization for Network Access Server (NAS) Management

abstract.t: This document specifies Remote Authentication Dial-In User Service (RADIUS) attributes for authorizing management access to a Network Access Server (NAS). Both local and remote management are supported, with granular access rights and management privileges. Specific provisions are made for remote management via framed management protocols, and for management access over a secure transport protocol.
